Package io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.data.provider.texture

Class Textures

java.lang.Object
io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.data.provider.texture.Textures
public class Textures extends Object
Provides preloaded textures, a computed target texture scale and source texture scales. See TextureProviderBase for the difference between image and texture ids and for information on scaling.

  • Method Details

    • scale

      public int scale()
      Gets the target texture scale. This indicates, how much the requested size has been scaled up.

    • textureScale

      public int textureScale​(String loc)
      Gets the scale for a source texture. This indicates, how much the given source texture needs to be scaled up to match the target scale.

    • imageScale

      public int imageScale​(String loc)
      Gets the scale for a source image. This indicates, how much the given source image needs to be scaled up to match the target scale.

    • textureScale

      public int textureScale​(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation loc)
      Gets the scale for a source texture. This indicates, how much the given source texture needs to be scaled up to match the target scale.

    • imageScale

      public int imageScale​(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation loc)
      Gets the scale for a source image. This indicates, how much the given source image needs to be scaled up to match the target scale.
